DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare debulking surgery and cytoreductive surgery in patients with Pseudomyxoma Peritonei with respect to efficacy and safety.
DOC.brief_title: Results of CRS and Debulking in PMP Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with radiology histopathology finding of Pseudomyxoma Peritonei Preformance status WHO >2 and histopathology shows other origin then Pseudomyxoma Peritonei
